title: Arabic Calligraphy Wooden Wall Clock ? 12x16 Inch Digital Print, Battery-Free Hanging Decor
description:
Enhance your home with this beautifully designed Digital Printed Wooden Wall Clock, a fusion of modern minimalism and traditional artistry. Measuring 12x16 inches, this rectangular timepiece showcases intricate Arabic calligraphy in gold and turquoise tones, set against a sleek backdrop with classic numerals and golden hour markers.

Crafted from high-quality wood, the clock offers a battery-free operation and comes with a hook for easy wall mounting, making it both practical and visually striking. The bold black hands and clear layout ensure easy readability, while the artistic calligraphy adds a spiritual and cultural depth to your d?cor.

Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, offices, or prayer spaces, this clock is more than just a timekeeper?it?s a statement piece that reflects elegance, heritage, and thoughtful design.
